issue.title: [Rust] Move JSON serde code to separate file/module
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2619](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2619). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2619?focusedCommentId=16852507) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Still of interest for 0.14?

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2619?focusedCommentId=16853818) by Andy Grove (andygrove):*
No, this isn't a priority for me.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2619?focusedCommentId=16954144) by Neville Dipale (nevi_me):*
`[~andygrove]`  is this for datatypes? If so, do we still need to do this? I'm happy with where the code is

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2619?focusedCommentId=16993771) by Neville Dipale (nevi_me):*
I'm closing this because the serde code has been updated to comply with the integration format, and I'm fine with where it is now.
